original_title: CERVIN: Le rêve de la Femme-Oiseau
overview: Géraldine Fasnacht is a wingsuit pilote that nurtures a dream since she learned to fly, the dream to be the first wingsuit pilote to jump from the top of the Matterhorn. Technological and technical advances have enabled her, along with her friend Julien Meyer, to achieve this world first on June 7, 2014 .
title: Matterhorn, The Birdwoman's Dream
